page.title: 05CHILDRENS GAMES PLUMSTEAD
page.content:
When you SKIP you use a skipping rope. You can sing a rhyme when you skip.You have two people skipping. The rhyme goes..."I like coffee...I like tea...I like Navjyot in with me...I don't like coffee...I don't like tea.. I don't like Navjyot in with me.Then you carry on, the person jumps out.Then someone else jumps in and so on.
When you play FORTY FORTY you have to get lots of people and one is on 'it'. The rhyme goes...nop force around me, up or down me,side by side me,forty forty,scat..and you run and hide. When you have hidden they will be counting to 44. If they see you they will say "forty forty I see Navjyot", then you're on 'it'.
MELANIE WALKER AGE 10
